about_the_game:
Take on the challenge of running your own mining business in MINER’S BUSINESS SIMULATOR, a highly realistic strategy and management game. Begin as a small-time miner with basic tools and work your way up to becoming a powerful industry leader by refining ore, automating production, and mastering the art of business growth.

Key Features:

Realistic Mining and Refining: Extract raw ore by hand and transform it into valuable resources like metal ingots. Sell them on the market or craft sought-after products to meet customer demand.

Advanced Automation: Gradually replace manual work with efficient systems. Hire and train employees, optimize workflows, and automate every stage — from mining and refining to logistics and sales.

Storefront Management: Open and manage your own shop to sell processed goods. Invest in upgrades, improve equipment, and hire staff to maximize customer satisfaction and profits.

Employee Management: Build a skilled team and assign them to key roles across your business. Balance their workload, focus on training, and ensure operations run smoothly as your company expands.

Facility Construction and Upgrades: Develop your business by building and enhancing structures, from ore-processing machines to retail store displays. Every upgrade boosts your productivity and efficiency.

Interactive NPCs: Engage with a wide range of characters, from workers and customers to townsfolk who can help you grow your business. Your interactions and choices will directly impact your company’s success.

Realism at Its Core: Experience a detailed and lifelike simulation of the mining industry, where every decision you make, from resource allocation to sales strategies, has tangible consequences on your company’s progress.

In MINER’S BUSINESS SIMULATOR, your entrepreneurial skills and attention to detail are your greatest assets. Strategize, innovate, and expand your business to create a mining empire that stands the test of time. Will you rise to the top as the ultimate mining tycoon?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: MINER’S BUSINESS SIMULATOR is a realistic management game where you build a mining empire from scratch. Start with manual labor, refine raw ore, and scale up to a fully automated enterprise to dominate the market.
